name: Don't Forget to Smile
storyline:
This isn't just a game; it's a raw, unfiltered scream against the soul-sucking monotony of minimum wage jobs and the oppressive corporate machine.
Dive headfirst into chaotic, visceral action where every moment is a battle for survival. Navigate through brutally exaggerated work settings that mock and ridicule today's societal norms.
Here, your only allies are your rage and the biting satire that underscores every scene. In "Don't Forget to Smile," you're not just playing a game – you're unleashing your frustrations and giving the middle finger to a world that demands conformity. So gear up and live the psychotic break.
summary:
Welcome to Don't Forget to Smile – the game that throws you into an adrenaline-fueled, anxiety-ridden trip through the darkest corners of modern life.

10+ weapons, 15+ augments, synergies and upgrades will help you break out of your day to day and fight back.
